programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;realtime audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if RT audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o rbjeq.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1
imode = p4 a1 vco2 .3, 155.6 ; sawtooth wave kfco expon 8000, p3, 200 ; filter frequency asig rbjeq a1, kfco, 1, kfco * 0.005, 1, imode outs asig, asig
endin </CsInstruments> <CsScore>
i 1 0 5 0 ;lowpass i 1 6 5 2 ;highpass i 1 12 5 4 ;bandpass i 1 18 5 8 ;equalizer
e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
